column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center and LFUCG offices will be closed on Friday November 10 in observance of Veteran's Day.
Traffic reports will resume Monday November 13 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Nicholasville Rd Lane Configuration Schedule for UK/Alabama Game:
column4: 9 a.m. to noon - 3 lanes inbound, 1 lane outbound.
